metadata.title: CVE-2017-6379 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Some administrative paths in Drupal 8.2.x before 8.2.7 did not includeprotection for CSRF. This would allow an attacker to disable some blocks ona site. This issue is mitigated by the fact that users would have to knowthe block ID.

criterions.comment: drupal7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was not-affected').
